column1: Nioro du Rip   is a city in the south-west of Sénégal
column2: situated about 60 km (37 mi) to the south-west of Kaolack and is 27 km (17 mi) from the border with The Gambia.

column1: The town of Nioro du Rip was the capital of Rip (a kingdom of the marabout leader Maba Diakhou Bâ). Cheikh Ahmadou Bamba Mbacké (founder of The Mouride brotherhood) at one point lived here. Nioro is near one group of the Senegambian stone circles which date from the eighth century.
The town is the capital of Nioro du Rip Department
Nioro du Rip is on the route nationale N4 which links Kaolack to Ziguinchor via The Gambia.
